verses.verse: וַיְהִ֧י <WH1961> had לִֽיהוֹשָׁפָ֛ט <WH3092> Now Jehoshaphat עֹ֥שֶׁר <WH6239> had riches וְכָב֖וֹד <WH3519> and honour לָרֹ֑ב <WH7230> in abundance וַיִּתְחַתֵּ֖ן <WH2859> and joined affinity לְאַחְאָֽב׃ <WH256> with Ahab

וַיֵּרֶד֩ <WH3381> he went down לְקֵ֨ץ <WH7093> And after שָׁנִ֤ים <WH8141> [certain] years אֶל־ <WH413> against אַחְאָב֙ <WH256> to Ahab לְשֹׁ֣מְר֔וֹן <WH8111> to Samaria וַיִּֽזְבַּֽח־ <WH2076> killed ל֨וֹ אַחְאָ֜ב <WH256> And Ahab צֹ֤אן <WH6629> sheep וּבָקָר֙ <WH1241> and oxen לָרֹ֔ב <WH7230> for him in abundance וְלָעָ֖ם <WH5971> and for the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who עִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> with וַיְסִיתֵ֕הוּ <WH5496> that [he had] with him and persuaded לַעֲל֖וֹת <WH5927> him to go up אֶל־ <WH413> against רָמ֥וֹת <WH7433> Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָֽד׃ <WH1568> Gilead

וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <WH559> said אַחְאָ֣ב <WH256> And Ahab מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהֽוֹשָׁפָט֙ <WH3092> unto Jehoshaphat מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah הֲתֵלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> go עִמִּ֖י <WH5973> with רָמֹ֣ת <WH7433> Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> Gilead וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said ל֗וֹ כָּמ֤וֹנִי <WH3644> according to כָמ֙וֹךָ֙ <WH3644> you וּכְעַמְּךָ֣ <WH5971> him I [am] as thou [art] and my people עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> as thy people וְעִמְּךָ֖ <WH5973> in בַּמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> and [we will be] with thee in the war

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוֹשָׁפָ֖ט <WH3092> And Jehoshaphat אֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel דְּרָשׁ־ <WH1875> Enquire נָ֥א <WH4994> Please כַיּ֖וֹם <WH3117> to day אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבַ֥ר <WH1697> I pray thee at the word יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיִּקְבֹּ֨ץ <WH6908> gathered together מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Therefore the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַנְּבִאִים֮ <WH5030> of prophets אַרְבַּ֣ע <WH702> four מֵא֣וֹת <WH3967> hundred אִישׁ֒ <WH376> men וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <WH413> against הֲנֵלֵ֞ךְ <WH1980> go אֶל־ <WH413> against רָמֹ֥ת <WH7433> Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָ֛ד <WH1568> Gilead לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> to battle אִם־ <WH518> or אֶחְדָּ֑ל <WH2308> or shall I forbear וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> ? And they said עֲלֵ֔ה <WH5927> Go up וְיִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> will deliver הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> for God בְּיַ֥ד <WH3027> hand הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> [it] into the king's

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said יְה֣וֹשָׁפָ֔ט <WH3092> But Jehoshaphat הַאֵ֨ין <WH369> is there פֹּ֥ה <WH6311> here נָבִ֛יא <WH5030> [Is there] not here a prophet לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD ע֑וֹד <WH5750> yet וְנִדְרְשָׁ֖ה <WH1875> besides that we might enquire מֵאֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל ׀ <WH3478> of Israel אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשָׁפָ֡ט <WH3092> unto Jehoshaphat ע֣וֹד <WH5750> is yet אִישׁ־ <WH376> man אֶחָ֡ד <WH259> [There is] yet one לִדְרוֹשׁ֩ <WH1875> by whom we may enquire אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֨ה <WH3069> God מֵֽאֹת֜וֹ <WH853> וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> I שְׂנֵאתִ֗יהוּ <WH8130> but I hate כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֵ֠ינֶנּוּ <WH369> never מִתְנַבֵּ֨א <WH5012> him for he never prophesied עָלַ֤י <WH5921> concerning לְטוֹבָה֙ <WH2896> good כִּ֣י <WH3588> for כָל־ <WH3605> but יָמָ֣יו <WH3117> unto me but always לְרָעָ֔ה <WH7451> evil ה֖וּא <WH1931> He מִיכָ֣יְהוּ <WH4321> the same [is] Micaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יִמְלָ֑א <WH3229> of Imla וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said יְה֣וֹשָׁפָ֔ט <WH3092> And Jehoshaphat אַל־ <WH408> nay יֹאמַ֥ר <WH559> say הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> Let not the king כֵּֽן׃ <WH3651> so

וַיִּקְרָא֙ <WH7121> called מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> about סָרִ֖יס <WH5631> [of his] officers אֶחָ֑ד <WH259> for one וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> and said מַהֵ֖ר <WH4116> Fetch quickly [מִיכָהוּ כ] (מִיכָ֥יְהוּ <WH4318> Micah ק) בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יִמְלָֽא׃ <WH3229> of Imla

וּמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֡ל <WH3478> of Israel וִֽיהוֹשָׁפָ֣ט <WH3092> and Jehoshaphat מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֡ה <WH3063> of Judah יוֹשְׁבִים֩ <WH3427> sat אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> either עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסְא֜וֹ <WH3678> of them on his throne מְלֻבָּשִׁ֤ים <WH3847> clothed בְּגָדִים֙ <WH899> in [their] robes וְיֹשְׁבִ֣ים <WH3427> and they sat בְּגֹ֔רֶן <WH1637> in a void place פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> at the entering in שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> of the gate שֹׁמְר֑וֹן <WH8111> of Samaria וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַ֨נְּבִיאִ֔ים <WH5030> and all the prophets מִֽתְנַבְּאִ֖ים <WH5012> prophesied לִפְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6440> before

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> had made ל֛וֹ צִדְקִיָּ֥הוּ <WH6667> And Zedekiah בֶֽן־ <WH1121> the son כְּנַעֲנָ֖ה <WH3668> of Chenaanah קַרְנֵ֣י <WH7161> him horns בַרְזֶ֑ל <WH1270> of iron וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> these תְּנַגַּ֥ח <WH5055> With these thou shalt push אֶת־ <WH853> אֲרָ֖ם <WH758> Syria עַד־ <WH5704> until כַּלּוֹתָֽם׃ <WH3615> until they be consumed

וְכָל־ <WH3605> All הַ֨נְּבִאִ֔ים <WH5030> And all the prophets נִבְּאִ֥ים <WH5012> prophesied כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> thus לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> so saying עֲלֵ֞ה <WH5927> Go up רָמֹ֤ת <WH7433> to Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָד֙ <WH1568> Gilead וְהַצְלַ֔ח <WH6743> and prosper וְנָתַ֥ן <WH5414> shall deliver יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> for the LORD בְּיַ֥ד <WH3027> [it] into the hand הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> of the king

וְהַמַּלְאָ֞ךְ <WH4397> And the messenger אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who הָלַ֣ךְ ׀ <WH1980> that went לִקְרֹ֣א <WH7121> to call לְמִיכָ֗יְהוּ <WH4321> Micaiah דִּבֶּ֤ר <WH1696> spake אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> to him לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> to him saying הִנֵּ֞ה <WH2009> Behold דִּבְרֵ֧י <WH1697> Behold the words הַנְּבִאִ֛ים <WH5030> of the prophets פֶּֽה־ <WH6310> assent אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> with one ט֖וֹב <WH2896> [declare] good אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king וִֽיהִי־ <WH1961> become נָ֧א <WH4994> please דְבָרְךָ֛ <WH1697> let thy word כְּאַחַ֥ד <WH259> therefore I pray thee be like one מֵהֶ֖ם <WH1992> of them וְדִבַּ֥רְתָּ <WH1696> of theirs and speak טּֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> thou good

וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> said מִיכָ֑יְהוּ <WH4321> And Micaiah חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֕ה <WH3068> [As] the LORD כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אֶת־ <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> what יֹאמַ֥ר <WH559> saith אֱלֹהַ֖י <WH430> even what my God אֹת֥וֹ <WH853> אֲדַבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> that will I speak

וַיָּבֹא֮ <WH935> And when he was come אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּלֶךְ֒ <WH4428> to the king וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him מִיכָה֙ <WH4318> unto him Micaiah הֲנֵלֵ֞ךְ <WH1980> go אֶל־ <WH413> to רָמֹ֥ת <WH7433> Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָ֛ד <WH1568> Gilead לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> to battle אִם־ <WH518> or אֶחְדָּ֑ל <WH2308> or shall I forbear וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> ? And he said עֲל֣וּ <WH5927> Go ye up וְהַצְלִ֔יחוּ <WH6743> and prosper וְיִנָּתְנ֖וּ <WH5414> and they shall be delivered בְּיֶדְכֶֽם׃ <WH3027> into your hand

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> then הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king עַד־ <WH5704> against כַּמֶּ֥ה <WH4100> how long פְעָמִ֖ים <WH6471> to him How many times אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I מַשְׁבִּיעֶ֑ךָ <WH7650> shall I adjure אֲ֠שֶׁר <WH834> to me לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nothing תְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> thee that thou say אֵלַ֛י <WH413> about רַק־ <WH7535> but אֱמֶ֖ת <WH571> nothing but the truth בְּשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> to me in the name יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Jehovah

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> Then he said רָאִ֤יתִי <WH7200> I did see אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> all Israel נְפוֹצִ֣ים <WH6327> scattered עַל־ <WH5921> on הֶֽהָרִ֔ים <WH2022> upon the mountains כַּצֹּ֕אן <WH6629> as sheep אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אֵין־ <WH369> have לָהֶ֖ן רֹעֶ֑ה <WH7462> that have no shepherd וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> and the LORD לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have no אֲדֹנִ֣ים <WH113> These have no master לָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> These יָשׁ֥וּבוּ <WH7725> let them return אִישׁ־ <WH376> [therefore] every man לְבֵית֖וֹ <WH1004> to his house בְּשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH7965> in peace

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> And the king יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשָׁפָ֑ט <WH3092> to Jehoshaphat הֲלֹא֙ <WH3808> not אָמַ֣רְתִּי <WH559> Did I not tell אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> about לֹא־ <WH3808> not יִתְנַבֵּ֥א <WH5012> thee [that] he would not prophesy עָלַ֛י <WH5921> concerning ט֖וֹב <WH2896> good כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo לְרָֽע׃ <WH7451> adversity ס

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> Again he said לָכֵ֖ן <WH3651> Therefore שִׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> Therefore hear דְבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD רָאִ֤יתִי <WH7200> I saw אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> sitting עַל־ <WH5921> on כִּסְא֔וֹ <WH3678> upon his throne וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all צְבָ֤א <WH6635> and all the host הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <WH8064> of heaven עֹֽמְדִ֔ים <WH5975> standing עַל־ <WH5921> on יְמִינ֖וֹ <WH3225> on his right hand וּשְׂמֹאלֽוֹ׃ <WH8040> and [on] his left

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> And the LORD מִ֤י <WH4310> Who יְפַתֶּה֙ <WH6601> Who shall entice אֶת־ <WH853> אַחְאָ֣ב <WH256> Ahab מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְיַ֕עַל <WH5927> that he may go up וְיִפֹּ֖ל <WH5307> and fall בְּרָמ֣וֹת <WH7433> Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָ֑ד <WH1568> Gilead וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> saying זֶ֚ה <WH2088> another אֹמֵ֣ר <WH559> and another saying כָּ֔כָה <WH3602> after this manner וְזֶ֖ה <WH2088> another אֹמֵ֥ר <WH559> said כָּֽכָה׃ <WH3602> after that manner

וַיֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> Then there came out הָר֗וּחַ <WH7307> a spirit וַֽיַּעֲמֹד֙ <WH5975> and stood לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and said אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I אֲפַתֶּ֑נּוּ <WH6601> I will entice וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> him And the LORD אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> about בַּמָּֽה׃ <WH4100> He

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵצֵא֙ <WH3318> I will go out וְהָיִ֙יתִי֙ <WH1961> become לְר֣וּחַ <WH7307> spirit שֶׁ֔קֶר <WH8267> and be a lying בְּפִ֖י <WH6310> in the mouth כָּל־ <WH3605> of all נְבִיאָ֑יו <WH5030> of all his prophets וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And [the LORD] said תְּפַתֶּה֙ <WH6601> Thou shalt entice וְגַם־ <WH1571> also תּוּכָ֔ל <WH3201> [him] and thou shalt also prevail צֵ֖א <WH3318> go out וַעֲשֵׂה־ <WH6213> and do כֵֽן׃ <WH3651> after that

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> behold נָתַ֤ן <WH5414> hath put יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Now therefore behold the LORD ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> spirit שֶׁ֔קֶר <WH8267> a lying בְּפִ֖י <WH6310> in the mouth נְבִיאֶ֣יךָ <WH5030> of these thy prophets אֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> of these וַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> and the LORD דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> hath spoken עָלֶ֖יךָ <WH5921> against רָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> evil ס
